I set up a crawl with host scope, with a seed list of about 800 URLs.
 My understanding of host scope is that it won't stray to sites not in
the original seed list, i.e. if www.site123.com has a link to
www.site456.com (which wasn't in the seed list), it won't crawl
www.site456.com.  In watching the crawl progress I've noticed it
straying and crawling sites that I didn't give it.

Am I misunderstanding the host scope?
